task.title: Signing in to the Eucalyptus Dashboard
task.shortdesc: This section describes how to sign in to the Eucalyptus Dashboard.

context.p: The Eucalyptus Dashboard is web-based interface that allows you to manage your system, identities, and resources.
To sign in to the Dashboard:

step.cmd: Open a browser window and go to https://<CLC_IP_address>:8443
Accept the self-signed SSL certificate and continue.
Enter your account name in the Account field.

choices.choice: For system admins, the account name is eucalyptus.

step.cmd: Enter your user name in the User field.
Enter your password in the Password field.

step.stepresult: The Dashboard Start Guide page displays.

postreq.p: You can now use the Dashboard to manage your system, identities, and resources.
